short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brings you to the home page of the current site with the click of a button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever wished you could get to the home page of a site quickly? Often times, web sites don't make their home page easily or intuitively accessible. With a simple click of the Site Home button, you will be brought to the home URL of the web site you are currently on.
